sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card elevation="0">
    <v-container>
      <v-row>
        <v-col
            v-for="category in formation.categories"
            align="center"
            class="my-3"
        >
          <v-btn
              elevation="2"
              width="15vw"
          >
            {{ category.toUpperCase() }}
          </v-btn>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
      <v-row>
        <v-list>
          <template
              v-for="category in formation.categories"
          >
            <v-subheader class="text-h6">
              {{ category.toUpperCase() }}
            </v-subheader>
            <template
                v-for="fmt in formation.values"
            >
              <v-list-item
                  v-if="fmt.category === category"
              >
                <v-list-item-content>
                  <v-list-item-title>{{ fmt.exp }}</v-list-item-title>
                  <v-list-item-subtitle>{{ fmt.date }}</v-list-item-subtitle>
                </v-list-item-content>
              </v-list-item>
            </template>
          </template>
        </v-list>
      </v-row>
    </v-container>
  </v-card>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: 'PortfolioFormation',
  props: {
    formation: {
      required: true
    }
  }
}
</script>
